short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Classic Simon Game - The #1 Game of Memory Skill!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
INTRODUCTION
Play Classic Simon Game on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No Internet required, no ADS, and 100% Free!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Classic Simon Game extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Classic Simon Game icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Classic Simon Game popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!
